TopicTitle: One Of The Biggest Stock Craft Exporters From The Spaceport (introduction) - Josea74

Articles.Content: Hello forum friends. I'm Jose Aparicio and i have uploaded lots of stock cool craft in the spaceport. I even invented a new stock way of propulsion which is collision propelant you can check out my craft on the spaceport simply by searching josea74. My goal is to make as many cool stock craft to provide to the KSP community so they can share the same fun i have with my own craft. I consider myself a stock ksp aircraft designer lol. Hope you guys enjoy my craft and stuff

Welcome to the forums! I would reccomend putting a link straight there to help people find it; and while your at it you should add some screen shots here so people dont just see a wall of text, get bored and leave!
Pics and craft are on the spaceport?? just search josea74 and it shows all of my craft in 2 pages and it should be there.
The search on Spaceport isn't very good. Anyway, you have to entice people. Just upload them to imgur and post them here.
